welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Newmarket, the charming town known as the 'Home of Horseracing'. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our historic city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cambridge Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cambridge Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying on private jets, the private terminal at Wethersfield Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: Stansted Airport's main terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to the main terminal, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Royal Air Force Alconbury Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
